HomePage.title: Build Your Next Blog in Hours, Not Weeks
HomePage.subtitle: A production-ready Next.js 15 starter kit with everything you need: Auth, Admin, MDX, Analytics, and more. Launch faster, focus on content.
HomePage.feature2Description: Write content using Markdown with components.
HomePage.feature3Description: Email login/signup, OAuth, password reset, 2FA, user profile and settings.
HomePage.feature4Description: Light and dark mode support out of the box.
HomePage.feature6Description: Easily extend and customize the boilerplate to fit your needs.
HomePage.feature7Description: Track page views, referrers, and user engagement.
HomePage.feature8Description: Components for ad placements and affiliate links.
